location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 5/15 Chronological chart of Political Agents at Muscat.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 19; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. Two additional foliation sequences, also written in pencil, are present in parallel between ff 3-18; one is not circled and one is circled but has been superseded and therefore crossed out.

mods.abstract: The file concerns attempts by the Political Agent, Muscat (Major Claude Edward Urquart Bremner) to compile a comprehensive list of Political Agents at Muscat from as early a date as possible. The file contains information on British representatives at Muscat from 1800, up to the date of Bremner's own incumbency.The file includes correspondence from the Political Agent, Muscat, and the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, and lists of British representatives/Political Agents at Muscat.
